title: Pvalyou
description:
Meet Val, your personal AI analyst. Val unlocks unparalleled research capabilities across multiple sources with remarkable speed including a search engine, research papers, patents database, startup database (2M+), people database, financial markets, and more. Explore 20+ public and private databases with natural language.

Our agent noticeably outperforms state-of-the-art research agents such as Perplexity, Co-Pilot, ChatGPT and others for information extraction tasks.
